name: DHL Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 DHL Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume DHL API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume DHL API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: shipment

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get

trackingNumber.name: trackingNumber
trackingNumber.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tracking Number | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: recipientPostalCode (值: None) - DHL will return more detailed information on the shipment when you provide the Recipient's Postal Code - it acts as a verification step
